mapper.select: select c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num lessonNum, one.title subjectLevelOne, two.title subjectLevelTwo, teacher.name teacherName, c.price from edu_course c left join edu_subject one on c.subject_parent_id=one.id left join edu_subject two on c.subject_id=two.id left join edu_teacher teacher on c.teacher_id=teacher.id where c.id=#{courseId}
